name: Bomber!
description:
A recreation of one of the many Bomber clones from the golden age of computer games.  Your aim is to knock down  the buildings to a certain level before your plane gets too low.  It's probably running out of fuel or something, who knows.

Press SPACE  to drop a bomb.

Original game: https://spectrumcomputing.co.uk/entry/10453/ZX-Spectrum/Bomber
